rationale: The fhir-sirb IG focuses on standardizing the exchange of research study forms for multi-site clinical research studies, specifically within the context of the NIH's single IRB policy. It utilizes FHIR R4 to define questionnaires and responses, aiming to streamline workflows and data exchange between researchers, relying sites, and sIRBs primarily in the US, with data originating from research study management systems.
